<root folderAbsolutePath="Custom/More4apps-Finance/Common">
  <xdm:dataModel xmlns="http://xmlns.oracle.com/oxp/xmlp" version="2.0" xmlns:xdm="http://xmlns.oracle.com/oxp/xmlp" xmlns:xsd="http://wwww.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" defaultDataSourceRef="demo" objectAbsolutePath="/Custom/More4apps-Finance/Common/ACTION_SQL.xdm">
    <xdm:description><![CDATA[undefined]]></xdm:description>
    <xdm:dataProperties>
      <xdm:property name="include_parameters" value="true" />
      <xdm:property name="include_null_Element" value="false" />
      <xdm:property name="include_rowsettag" value="false" />
      <xdm:property name="exclude_tags_for_lob" value="false" />
      <xdm:property name="xml_tag_case" value="upper" />
      <xdm:property name="generate_output_format" value="xml" />
      <xdm:property name="sql_monitor_report_generated" value="false" />
      <xdm:property name="optimize_query_executions" value="false" />
    </xdm:dataProperties>
    <xdm:dataSets>
      <xdm:dataSet name="ACTION_SQL" type="complex">
        <xdm:sql dataSourceRef="ApplicationDB_HCM"><![CDATA[SELECT meaning, 
lookup_code, 
lookup_Type 
from fnd_lookup_values_vl 
WHERE lookup_type= 'CMP_SAL_XLS_LOADER_MODE' 
and Lookup_code <> 'DELETE'
AND (MEANING IN (:ACTION) OR MEANING LIKE :ACTION_SEARCH)
AND ROWNUM <10000]]></xdm:sql>
      </xdm:dataSet>
    </xdm:dataSets>
    <xdm:output rootName="DATA_DS" uniqueRowName="false">
      <xdm:nodeList name="data-structure">
        <xdm:dataStructure tagName="DATA_DS">
          <xdm:group name="G_1" label="G_1" source="ACTION_SQL">
            <xdm:element name="MEANING" value="MEANING" label="MEANING" dataType="xsd:string" breakOrder="" fieldOrder="1" />
            <xdm:element name="LOOKUP_CODE" value="LOOKUP_CODE" label="LOOKUP_CODE" dataType="xsd:string" breakOrder="" fieldOrder="2" />
            <xdm:element name="LOOKUP_TYPE" value="LOOKUP_TYPE" label="LOOKUP_TYPE" dataType="xsd:string" breakOrder="" fieldOrder="3" />
          </xdm:group>
        </xdm:dataStructure>
      </xdm:nodeList>
    </xdm:output>
    <xdm:eventTriggers />
    <xdm:lexicals />
    <xdm:parameters>
      <xdm:parameter name="ACTION_SEARCH" dataType="xsd:string" rowPlacement="1">
        <xdm:input label="Action Search" refreshParameters="true" />
      </xdm:parameter>
      <xdm:parameter name="ACTION" dataType="xsd:string" rowPlacement="1">
        <xdm:input label="Action" refreshParameters="true" />
      </xdm:parameter>
    </xdm:parameters>
    <xdm:valueSets />
    <xdm:bursting />
    <xdm:validations>
      <xdm:validation>N</xdm:validation>
    </xdm:validations>
    <xdm:display>
      <xdm:layouts>
        <xdm:layout name="ACTION_SQL" left="280px" top="343px" />
        <xdm:layout name="DATA_DS" left="5px" top="343px" />
      </xdm:layouts>
      <xdm:groupLinks />
    </xdm:display>
  </xdm:dataModel>
  <xdm:dataModel xmlns="http://xmlns.oracle.com/oxp/xmlp" version="2.0" xmlns:xdm="http://xmlns.oracle.com/oxp/xmlp" xmlns:xsd="http://wwww.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" defaultDataSourceRef="demo" objectAbsolutePath="/Custom/More4apps-Finance/Common/ASSIGNED_USERS.xdm">
    <xdm:description><![CDATA[undefined]]></xdm:description>
    <xdm:dataProperties>
      <xdm:property name="include_parameters" value="true" />
      <xdm:property name="include_null_Element" value="false" />
      <xdm:property name="include_rowsettag" value="false" />
      <xdm:property name="exclude_tags_for_lob" value="false" />
      <xdm:property name="xml_tag_case" value="upper" />
      <xdm:property name="generate_output_format" value="xml" />
      <xdm:property name="sql_monitor_report_generated" value="false" />
      <xdm:property name="optimize_query_executions" value="false" />
    </xdm:dataProperties>
    <xdm:dataSets>
      <xdm:dataSet name="ASSIGNED_USERS" type="complex">
        <xdm:sql dataSourceRef="ApplicationDB_HCM"><![CDATA[SELECT
u.username,
u.user_ID,
d.first_name, 
d.last_name surname,
d.EMAIL_ADDRESS email
FROM per_users u LEFT OUTER JOIN hrt_persons_d d ON (d.person_id = u.person_id AND SYSDATE between d.effective_start_date and d.effective_end_date)
WHERE u.active_flag='Y' 
AND u.username IN (:USERS)
AND ROWNUM < 10000
ORDER BY d.first_name,d.last_name]]></xdm:sql>
      </xdm:dataSet>
    </xdm:dataSets>
    <xdm:output rootName="DATA_DS" uniqueRowName="false">
      <xdm:nodeList name="data-structure">
        <xdm:dataStructure tagName="DATA_DS">
          <xdm:group name="G_1" label="G_1" source="ASSIGNED_USERS">
            <xdm:element name="USERNAME" value="USERNAME" label="USERNAME" dataType="xsd:string" breakOrder="" fieldOrder="1" />
            <xdm:element name="USER_ID" value="USER_ID" label="USER_ID" dataType="xsd:double" breakOrder="" fieldOrder="2" />
            <xdm:element name="FIRST_NAME" value="FIRST_NAME" label="FIRST_NAME" dataType="xsd:string" breakOrder="" fieldOrder="3" />
            <xdm:element name="SURNAME" value="SURNAME" label="SURNAME" dataType="xsd:string" breakOrder="" fieldOrder="4" />
            <xdm:element name="EMAIL" value="EMAIL" label="EMAIL" dataType="xsd:string" breakOrder="" fieldOrder="5" />
          </xdm:group>
        </xdm:dataStructure>
      </xdm:nodeList>
    </xdm:output>
    <xdm:eventTriggers />
    <xdm:lexicals />
    <xdm:parameters>
      <xdm:parameter name="USERS" dataType="xsd:string" rowPlacement="1">
        <xdm:input label="Assigned Users" />
      </xdm:parameter>
    </xdm:parameters>
    <xdm:valueSets />
    <xdm:bursting />
    <xdm:validations>
      <xdm:validation>N</xdm:validation>
    </xdm:validations>
    <xdm:display>

        <xdm:layout name="DATA_DS" left="5px" top="317px" />
      </xdm:layouts>
      <xdm:groupLinks />
    </xdm:display>
  </xdm:dataModel>
  <xdm:dataModel xmlns="http://xmlns.oracle.com/oxp/xmlp" version="2.0" xmlns:xdm="http://xmlns.oracle.com/oxp/xmlp" xmlns:xsd="http://wwww.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" defaultDataSourceRef="demo" objectAbsolutePath="/Custom/More4apps-Finance/Common/ATTACHMENT_CATEGORY.xdm">

      <xdm:property name="enable_xml_chunks" value="" />
      <xdm:property name="sql_monitor_report_generated" value="false" />
    </xdm:dataProperties>
    <xdm:dataSets>
      <xdm:dataSet name="Attachment Category" type="complex">
        <xdm:sql dataSourceRef="ApplicationDB_FSCM"><![CDATA[SELECT CAT.CATEGORY_NAME,
CAT.USER_NAME ,
CAT.DESCRIPTION ,
CAT.APPLICATION_ID,
ENTITY_NAME
FROM fusion.FND_DOCUMENT_CATEGORIES_VL CAT ,
fusion.FND_DOC_CATEGORIES_TO_ENTITIES CATTOENT,
fusion.FND_DOCUMENT_ENTITIES ENTITY
WHERE CAT.CATEGORY_ID = CATTOENT.CATEGORY_ID
AND CATTOENT.DOCUMENT_ENTITY_ID = ENTITY.DOCUMENT_ENTITY_ID
AND ENTITY_NAME IN (:ENTITY_NAME)
AND (user_name IN (:NAME) OR user_name LIKE (:NAME_SEARCH))]]></xdm:sql>

    <xdm:dataProperties>
      <xdm:property name="include_parameters" value="true" />

    <xdm:dataSets>
      <xdm:dataSet name="Context" type="complex">
        <xdm:sql dataSourceRef="ApplicationDB_FSCM"><![CDATA[SELECT
  v.NAME descriptive_flex_context_name,
  v.description,
  v.CONTEXT_CODE descriptive_flex_context_code,
  v.APPLICATION_ID,
  v.DESCRIPTIVE_FLEXFIELD_CODE FLEX_CODE,
  NVL(v.CONTEXT_IDENTIFIER, v.CONTEXT_CODE) SEGMENT_IDENTIFIER
FROM
  FND_DF_CONTEXTS_VL v
WHERE
  v.enabled_flag = 'Y'
  AND v.application_id IN (:APPLICATION_ID)
  AND v.DESCRIPTIVE_FLEXFIELD_CODE IN (:FLEX_CODE)
  AND (
    v.NAME IN (:CONTEXT)
    OR v.NAME LIKE (:CONTEXT_SEARCH)
  )]]></xdm:sql>
      </xdm:dataSet>

  <xdm:dataModel xmlns="http://xmlns.oracle.com/oxp/xmlp" version="2.0" xmlns:xdm="http://xmlns.oracle.com/oxp/xmlp" xmlns:xsd="http://wwww.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" defaultDataSourceRef="demo" objectAbsolutePath="/Custom/More4apps-Finance/Common/DFF_INFORMATION.xdm">
    <xdm:dataProperties>
      <xdm:property name="include_parameters" value="true" />
      <xdm:property name="include_null_Element" value="true" />
      <xdm:property name="include_rowsettag" value="false" />
      <xdm:property name="exclude_tags_for_lob" value="false" />
      <xdm:property name="EXCLUDE_LINE_FEED_AND_CARRIAGE_RETURN_FOR_LOB" value="false" />
      <xdm:property name="xml_tag_case" value="upper" />
      <xdm:property name="generate_output_format" value="xml" />
      <xdm:property name="optimize_query_executions" value="false" />
      <xdm:property name="enable_xml_chunks" value="" />
      <xdm:property name="sql_monitor_report_generated" value="false" />
    </xdm:dataProperties>
    <xdm:dataSets>
      <xdm:dataSet name="DFF" type="complex">
        <xdm:sql dataSourceRef="ApplicationDB_FSCM"><![CDATA[SELECT
  attr.descriptive_flexfield_code descriptive_flexfield_name,
  attr.application_id,
  NVL(cntxt.name, 'Global Data Elements') descriptive_flex_context_name,
  NVL(cntxt.context_code, 'Global Data Elements') descriptive_flex_context_code,
  attr.SEQUENCE_NUMBER,
  attr.name,
  attr.segment_code,
  attr.column_name,
  attr.Segment_identifier,
  attr.value_set_id,
  attr.read_only_flag,
  attr.required_flag,
  attr.display_type,
  vs.validation_type,
  NVL(cntxt.CONTEXT_IDENTIFIER, cntxt.CONTEXT_CODE) context_segment_identifier,
  CASE
    WHEN vst.id_column_name IS NULL THEN 'N'
    ELSE 'Y'
  END use_display_value,
  (SELECT
  c.column_type
FROM
  fnd_columns c
  JOIN fnd_tables t ON (c.table_id = t.table_id)
  JOIN fnd_ff_column_usages cu ON (cu.column_name = c.column_name
    AND cu.table_name = t.table_name
    AND cu.flexfield_type = 'DFF'
    AND cu.column_usage_type = 'SEGMENT')
  JOIN fnd_df_table_usages tu ON (tu.table_usage_code = cu.table_usage_code
    AND tu.table_name = cu.table_name
    AND tu.table_type = 'BASE')
  JOIN fnd_df_flex_usages_b fu ON (fu.application_id = tu.application_id
    AND fu.descriptive_flexfield_code = tu.descriptive_flexfield_code
    AND fu.flexfield_usage_code = tu.flexfield_usage_code
    AND fu.usage_type = 'D')
WHERE
  fu.descriptive_flexfield_code = attr.descriptive_flexfield_code
  AND fu.application_id = attr.application_id
  AND cu.column_name = attr.column_name) COLUMN_TYPE
FROM
  fnd_df_segments_vl attr 
  JOIN fnd_flex_value_sets vs ON (vs.flex_value_set_id = attr.value_set_id)
  LEFT OUTER JOIN fnd_flex_validation_tables vst ON (vst.flex_value_set_id = vs.flex_value_set_id)
  LEFT OUTER JOIN FND_DF_CONTEXTS_VL cntxt ON (cntxt.application_id = attr.application_id
        AND cntxt.descriptive_flexfield_code = attr.descriptive_flexfield_code
        AND cntxt.context_code = attr.context_code)
WHERE
  attr.descriptive_flexfield_code IN (:FLEX_CODE)
  AND attr.application_id IN (:APPLICATION_ID)
  AND attr.enabled_flag = 'Y'
order by
  attr.descriptive_flexfield_code,
  attr.application_id,
  attr.CONTEXT_CODE,
  attr.SEQUENCE_NUMBER]]></xdm:sql>
      </xdm:dataSet>
    </xdm:dataSets>

            <xdm:element name="APPLICATION_ID" value="APPLICATION_ID" label="APPLICATION_ID" dataType="xsd:double" breakOrder="" fieldOrder="2" />
            <xdm:element name="DESCRIPTIVE_FLEX_CONTEXT_NAME" value="DESCRIPTIVE_FLEX_CONTEXT_NAME" label="DESCRIPTIVE_FLEX_CONTEXT_NAME" dataType="xsd:string" breakOrder="" fieldOrder="3" />
            <xdm:element name="DESCRIPTIVE_FLEX_CONTEXT_CODE" value="DESCRIPTIVE_FLEX_CONTEXT_CODE" label="DESCRIPTIVE_FLEX_CONTEXT_CODE" dataType="xsd:string" breakOrder="" fieldOrder="4" />
            <xdm:element name="NAME" value="NAME" label="NAME" dataType="xsd:string" breakOrder="" fieldOrder="6" />
            <xdm:element name="SEQUENCE_NUMBER" value="SEQUENCE_NUMBER" label="SEQUENCE_NUMBER" dataType="xsd:integer" breakOrder="" fieldOrder="5" />
            <xdm:element name="COLUMN_NAME" value="COLUMN_NAME" label="COLUMN_NAME" dataType="xsd:string" breakOrder="" fieldOrder="8" />
            <xdm:element name="SEGMENT_IDENTIFIER" value="SEGMENT_IDENTIFIER" label="SEGMENT_IDENTIFIER" dataType="xsd:string" breakOrder="" fieldOrder="9" />
            <xdm:element name="VALUE_SET_ID" value="VALUE_SET_ID" label="VALUE_SET_ID" dataType="xsd:double" breakOrder="" fieldOrder="10" />
            <xdm:element name="VALIDATION_TYPE" value="VALIDATION_TYPE" label="VALIDATION_TYPE" dataType="xsd:string" breakOrder="" fieldOrder="14" />
            <xdm:element name="USE_DISPLAY_VALUE" value="USE_DISPLAY_VALUE" label="USE_DISPLAY_VALUE" dataType="xsd:string" breakOrder="" fieldOrder="16" />
            <xdm:element name="CONTEXT_SEGMENT_IDENTIFIER" value="CONTEXT_SEGMENT_IDENTIFIER" label="CONTEXT_SEGMENT_IDENTIFIER" dataType="xsd:string" breakOrder="" fieldOrder="15" />
            <xdm:element name="COLUMN_TYPE" value="COLUMN_TYPE" label="COLUMN_TYPE" dataType="xsd:string" breakOrder="" fieldOrder="17" />
            <xdm:element name="SEGMENT_CODE" value="SEGMENT_CODE" label="SEGMENT_CODE" dataType="xsd:string" breakOrder="" fieldOrder="7" />
            <xdm:element name="READ_ONLY_FLAG" value="READ_ONLY_FLAG" label="READ_ONLY_FLAG" dataType="xsd:string" breakOrder="" fieldOrder="11" />
            <xdm:element name="REQUIRED_FLAG" value="REQUIRED_FLAG" label="REQUIRED_FLAG" dataType="xsd:string" breakOrder="" fieldOrder="12" />
            <xdm:element name="DISPLAY_TYPE" value="DISPLAY_TYPE" label="DISPLAY_TYPE" dataType="xsd:string" breakOrder="" fieldOrder="13" />
          </xdm:group>
        </xdm:dataStructure>

      <xdm:dataSet name="INSTANCE_INFORMATION" type="complex">
        <xdm:sql dataSourceRef="ApplicationDB_FSCM"><![CDATA[SELECT 
   (SELECT NVL(pov.profile_option_value, 'en') lang_code
   FROM per_users users
     LEFT JOIN fnd_profile_option_values pov
          JOIN fnd_profile_options po ON (po.profile_option_id = pov.profile_option_id 
                                          AND po.profile_option_name IN ('FND_LANGUAGE'))
     ON (pov.level_value = users.user_guid)
   WHERE UPPER(users.username) = UPPER(:xdo_user_name)) lang_code,
  name, 
  type

    <xdm:dataSets>
      <xdm:dataSet name="USERS" type="complex">
        <xdm:sql dataSourceRef="ApplicationDB_FSCM"><![CDATA[SELECT
u.username,
u.user_ID,
d.first_name, 
d.last_name surname,
d.EMAIL_ADDRESS email
FROM per_users u JOIN hrt_persons_d d USING (person_id)
WHERE 
u.active_flag='Y' 
AND SYSDATE between d.effective_start_date and d.effective_end_date
AND u.username  like :SEARCH
AND ROWNUM < 10000
ORDER BY d.first_name,d.last_name]]></xdm:sql>
      </xdm:dataSet>
      <xdm:dataSet name="actions" type="complex">
        <xdm:sql dataSourceRef="ApplicationDB_FSCM"><![CDATA[SELECT meaning, 
lookup_code, 
lookup_Type 
from fnd_lookup_values_vl 
WHERE lookup_type= 'CMP_SAL_XLS_LOADER_MODE' 
and Lookup_code <> 'DELETE'
AND (MEANING IN (:ACTION) OR MEANING LIKE :ACTION_SEARCH)
AND ROWNUM <10000]]></xdm:sql>
      </xdm:dataSet>
    </xdm:dataSets>

    <xdm:description><![CDATA[undefined]]></xdm:description>
    <xdm:dataProperties>

    </xdm:dataProperties>
    <xdm:dataSets>
      <xdm:dataSet name="ACTION_SQL" type="complex">
        <xdm:sql dataSourceRef="ApplicationDB_HCM"><![CDATA[SELECT meaning, 
lookup_code, 
lookup_Type 
from fnd_lookup_values_vl 
WHERE lookup_type= 'CMP_SAL_XLS_LOADER_MODE' 
and Lookup_code <> 'DELETE'
AND (MEANING IN (:ACTION) OR MEANING LIKE :ACTION_SEARCH)
AND ROWNUM <10000]]></xdm:sql>
      </xdm:dataSet>
    </xdm:dataSets>
    <xdm:output rootName="DATA_DS" uniqueRowName="false">
      <xdm:nodeList name="data-structure">
        <xdm:dataStructure tagName="DATA_DS">
          <xdm:group name="G_1" label="G_1" source="ACTION_SQL">
            <xdm:element name="MEANING" value="MEANING" label="MEANING" dataType="xsd:string" breakOrder="" fieldOrder="1" />
            <xdm:element name="LOOKUP_CODE" value="LOOKUP_CODE" label="LOOKUP_CODE" dataType="xsd:string" breakOrder="" fieldOrder="2" />
            <xdm:element name="LOOKUP_TYPE" value="LOOKUP_TYPE" label="LOOKUP_TYPE" dataType="xsd:string" breakOrder="" fieldOrder="3" />
          </xdm:group>
        </xdm:dataStructure>
      </xdm:nodeList>
    </xdm:output>

      <xdm:parameter name="ACTION_SEARCH" dataType="xsd:string" rowPlacement="1">

      </xdm:parameter>

        <xdm:input label="Action" refreshParameters="true" />
      </xdm:parameter>
    </xdm:parameters>

    <xdm:validations>

    </xdm:validations>

        <xdm:layout name="ACTION_SQL" left="280px" top="343px" />
        <xdm:layout name="DATA_DS" left="5px" top="343px" />
      </xdm:layouts>
      <xdm:groupLinks />
    </xdm:display>
  </xdm:dataModel>
  <xdm:dataModel xmlns="http://xmlns.oracle.com/oxp/xmlp" version="2.0" xmlns:xdm="http://xmlns.oracle.com/oxp/xmlp" xmlns:xsd="http://wwww.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" defaultDataSourceRef="demo" objectAbsolutePath="/Custom/More4apps-Finance/Common/ASSIGNED_USERS.xdm">
    <xdm:description><![CDATA[undefined]]></xdm:description>
    <xdm:dataProperties>
      <xdm:property name="include_parameters" value="true" />
      <xdm:property name="include_null_Element" value="false" />
      <xdm:property name="include_rowsettag" value="false" />
      <xdm:property name="exclude_tags_for_lob" value="false" />
      <xdm:property name="xml_tag_case" value="upper" />
      <xdm:property name="generate_output_format" value="xml" />
      <xdm:property name="sql_monitor_report_generated" value="false" />
      <xdm:property name="optimize_query_executions" value="false" />
    </xdm:dataProperties>
    <xdm:dataSets>
      <xdm:dataSet name="ASSIGNED_USERS" type="complex">
        <xdm:sql dataSourceRef="ApplicationDB_HCM"><![CDATA[SELECT
u.username,
u.user_ID,
d.first_name, 
d.last_name surname,
d.EMAIL_ADDRESS email
FROM per_users u LEFT OUTER JOIN hrt_persons_d d ON (d.person_id = u.person_id AND SYSDATE between d.effective_start_date and d.effective_end_date)
WHERE u.active_flag='Y' 
AND u.username IN (:USERS)
AND ROWNUM < 10000
ORDER BY d.first_name,d.last_name]]></xdm:sql>
      </xdm:dataSet>
    </xdm:dataSets>
    <xdm:output rootName="DATA_DS" uniqueRowName="false">

      <xdm:dataSet name="Attachment Category" type="complex">
        <xdm:sql dataSourceRef="ApplicationDB_FSCM"><![CDATA[SELECT CAT.CATEGORY_NAME,

CAT.DESCRIPTION ,
CAT.APPLICATION_ID,
ENTITY_NAME
FROM fusion.FND_DOCUMENT_CATEGORIES_VL CAT ,
fusion.FND_DOC_CATEGORIES_TO_ENTITIES CATTOENT,
fusion.FND_DOCUMENT_ENTITIES ENTITY
WHERE CAT.CATEGORY_ID = CATTOENT.CATEGORY_ID
AND CATTOENT.DOCUMENT_ENTITY_ID = ENTITY.DOCUMENT_ENTITY_ID
AND ENTITY_NAME IN (:ENTITY_NAME)
AND (user_name IN (:NAME) OR user_name LIKE (:NAME_SEARCH))]]></xdm:sql>

  <xdm:dataModel xmlns="http://xmlns.oracle.com/oxp/xmlp" version="2.0" xmlns:xdm="http://xmlns.oracle.com/oxp/xmlp" xmlns:xsd="http://wwww.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" defaultDataSourceRef="demo" objectAbsolutePath="/Custom/More4apps-Finance/Common/DFF_CONTEXT.xdm">
    <xdm:dataProperties>
      <xdm:property name="include_parameters" value="true" />

      <xdm:property name="include_rowsettag" value="false" />

    <xdm:dataSets>
      <xdm:dataSet name="Context" type="complex">
        <xdm:sql dataSourceRef="ApplicationDB_FSCM"><![CDATA[SELECT
  v.NAME descriptive_flex_context_name,
  v.description,
  v.CONTEXT_CODE descriptive_flex_context_code,
  v.APPLICATION_ID,
  v.DESCRIPTIVE_FLEXFIELD_CODE FLEX_CODE,
  NVL(v.CONTEXT_IDENTIFIER, v.CONTEXT_CODE) SEGMENT_IDENTIFIER
FROM
  FND_DF_CONTEXTS_VL v
WHERE
  v.enabled_flag = 'Y'
  AND v.application_id IN (:APPLICATION_ID)
  AND v.DESCRIPTIVE_FLEXFIELD_CODE IN (:FLEX_CODE)
  AND (
    v.NAME IN (:CONTEXT)
    OR v.NAME LIKE (:CONTEXT_SEARCH)
  )]]></xdm:sql>
      </xdm:dataSet>

  <xdm:dataModel xmlns="http://xmlns.oracle.com/oxp/xmlp" version="2.0" xmlns:xdm="http://xmlns.oracle.com/oxp/xmlp" xmlns:xsd="http://wwww.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" defaultDataSourceRef="demo" objectAbsolutePath="/Custom/More4apps-Finance/Common/DFF_INFORMATION.xdm">
    <xdm:dataProperties>
      <xdm:property name="include_parameters" value="true" />
      <xdm:property name="include_null_Element" value="true" />
      <xdm:property name="include_rowsettag" value="false" />
      <xdm:property name="exclude_tags_for_lob" value="false" />
      <xdm:property name="EXCLUDE_LINE_FEED_AND_CARRIAGE_RETURN_FOR_LOB" value="false" />
      <xdm:property name="xml_tag_case" value="upper" />
      <xdm:property name="generate_output_format" value="xml" />
      <xdm:property name="optimize_query_executions" value="false" />
      <xdm:property name="enable_xml_chunks" value="" />
      <xdm:property name="sql_monitor_report_generated" value="false" />
    </xdm:dataProperties>
    <xdm:dataSets>
      <xdm:dataSet name="DFF" type="complex">
        <xdm:sql dataSourceRef="ApplicationDB_FSCM"><![CDATA[SELECT
  attr.descriptive_flexfield_code descriptive_flexfield_name,
  attr.application_id,
  NVL(cntxt.name, 'Global Data Elements') descriptive_flex_context_name,
  NVL(cntxt.context_code, 'Global Data Elements') descriptive_flex_context_code,
  attr.SEQUENCE_NUMBER,
  attr.name,
  attr.segment_code,
  attr.column_name,
  attr.Segment_identifier,
  attr.value_set_id,
  attr.read_only_flag,
  attr.required_flag,
  attr.display_type,
  vs.validation_type,
  NVL(cntxt.CONTEXT_IDENTIFIER, cntxt.CONTEXT_CODE) context_segment_identifier,
  CASE
    WHEN vst.id_column_name IS NULL THEN 'N'
    ELSE 'Y'
  END use_display_value,
  (SELECT
  c.column_type
FROM
  fnd_columns c
  JOIN fnd_tables t ON (c.table_id = t.table_id)
  JOIN fnd_ff_column_usages cu ON (cu.column_name = c.column_name
    AND cu.table_name = t.table_name
    AND cu.flexfield_type = 'DFF'
    AND cu.column_usage_type = 'SEGMENT')
  JOIN fnd_df_table_usages tu ON (tu.table_usage_code = cu.table_usage_code
    AND tu.table_name = cu.table_name
    AND tu.table_type = 'BASE')
  JOIN fnd_df_flex_usages_b fu ON (fu.application_id = tu.application_id
    AND fu.descriptive_flexfield_code = tu.descriptive_flexfield_code
    AND fu.flexfield_usage_code = tu.flexfield_usage_code
    AND fu.usage_type = 'D')
WHERE
  fu.descriptive_flexfield_code = attr.descriptive_flexfield_code
  AND fu.application_id = attr.application_id
  AND cu.column_name = attr.column_name) COLUMN_TYPE
FROM
  fnd_df_segments_vl attr 
  JOIN fnd_flex_value_sets vs ON (vs.flex_value_set_id = attr.value_set_id)
  LEFT OUTER JOIN fnd_flex_validation_tables vst ON (vst.flex_value_set_id = vs.flex_value_set_id)
  LEFT OUTER JOIN FND_DF_CONTEXTS_VL cntxt ON (cntxt.application_id = attr.application_id
        AND cntxt.descriptive_flexfield_code = attr.descriptive_flexfield_code
        AND cntxt.context_code = attr.context_code)
WHERE
  attr.descriptive_flexfield_code IN (:FLEX_CODE)
  AND attr.application_id IN (:APPLICATION_ID)
  AND attr.enabled_flag = 'Y'
order by
  attr.descriptive_flexfield_code,
  attr.application_id,
  attr.CONTEXT_CODE,
  attr.SEQUENCE_NUMBER]]></xdm:sql>
      </xdm:dataSet>
    </xdm:dataSets>

            <xdm:element name="DESCRIPTIVE_FLEXFIELD_NAME" value="DESCRIPTIVE_FLEXFIELD_NAME" label="DESCRIPTIVE_FLEXFIELD_NAME" dataType="xsd:string" breakOrder="" fieldOrder="1" />
            <xdm:element name="APPLICATION_ID" value="APPLICATION_ID" label="APPLICATION_ID" dataType="xsd:double" breakOrder="" fieldOrder="2" />
            <xdm:element name="DESCRIPTIVE_FLEX_CONTEXT_NAME" value="DESCRIPTIVE_FLEX_CONTEXT_NAME" label="DESCRIPTIVE_FLEX_CONTEXT_NAME" dataType="xsd:string" breakOrder="" fieldOrder="3" />
            <xdm:element name="DESCRIPTIVE_FLEX_CONTEXT_CODE" value="DESCRIPTIVE_FLEX_CONTEXT_CODE" label="DESCRIPTIVE_FLEX_CONTEXT_CODE" dataType="xsd:string" breakOrder="" fieldOrder="4" />
            <xdm:element name="NAME" value="NAME" label="NAME" dataType="xsd:string" breakOrder="" fieldOrder="6" />
            <xdm:element name="SEQUENCE_NUMBER" value="SEQUENCE_NUMBER" label="SEQUENCE_NUMBER" dataType="xsd:integer" breakOrder="" fieldOrder="5" />
            <xdm:element name="COLUMN_NAME" value="COLUMN_NAME" label="COLUMN_NAME" dataType="xsd:string" breakOrder="" fieldOrder="8" />
            <xdm:element name="SEGMENT_IDENTIFIER" value="SEGMENT_IDENTIFIER" label="SEGMENT_IDENTIFIER" dataType="xsd:string" breakOrder="" fieldOrder="9" />
            <xdm:element name="VALUE_SET_ID" value="VALUE_SET_ID" label="VALUE_SET_ID" dataType="xsd:double" breakOrder="" fieldOrder="10" />
            <xdm:element name="VALIDATION_TYPE" value="VALIDATION_TYPE" label="VALIDATION_TYPE" dataType="xsd:string" breakOrder="" fieldOrder="14" />
            <xdm:element name="USE_DISPLAY_VALUE" value="USE_DISPLAY_VALUE" label="USE_DISPLAY_VALUE" dataType="xsd:string" breakOrder="" fieldOrder="16" />
            <xdm:element name="CONTEXT_SEGMENT_IDENTIFIER" value="CONTEXT_SEGMENT_IDENTIFIER" label="CONTEXT_SEGMENT_IDENTIFIER" dataType="xsd:string" breakOrder="" fieldOrder="15" />
            <xdm:element name="COLUMN_TYPE" value="COLUMN_TYPE" label="COLUMN_TYPE" dataType="xsd:string" breakOrder="" fieldOrder="17" />
            <xdm:element name="SEGMENT_CODE" value="SEGMENT_CODE" label="SEGMENT_CODE" dataType="xsd:string" breakOrder="" fieldOrder="7" />
            <xdm:element name="READ_ONLY_FLAG" value="READ_ONLY_FLAG" label="READ_ONLY_FLAG" dataType="xsd:string" breakOrder="" fieldOrder="11" />
            <xdm:element name="REQUIRED_FLAG" value="REQUIRED_FLAG" label="REQUIRED_FLAG" dataType="xsd:string" breakOrder="" fieldOrder="12" />
            <xdm:element name="DISPLAY_TYPE" value="DISPLAY_TYPE" label="DISPLAY_TYPE" dataType="xsd:string" breakOrder="" fieldOrder="13" />
          </xdm:group>
        </xdm:dataStructure>
      </xdm:nodeList>
    </xdm:output>

    <xdm:lexicals />
    <xdm:parameters>
      <xdm:parameter name="FLEX_CODE" dataType="xsd:string" rowPlacement="1">
        <xdm:input label="Flex Code" refreshParameters="true" />
      </xdm:parameter>
      <xdm:parameter name="APPLICATION_ID" dataType="xsd:string" rowPlacement="1">
        <xdm:input label="App ID" refreshParameters="true" />

    </xdm:parameters>

    <xdm:dataSets>
      <xdm:dataSet name="INSTANCE_INFORMATION" type="complex">
        <xdm:sql dataSourceRef="ApplicationDB_FSCM"><![CDATA[SELECT 
   (SELECT NVL(pov.profile_option_value, 'en') lang_code
   FROM per_users users
     LEFT JOIN fnd_profile_option_values pov
          JOIN fnd_profile_options po ON (po.profile_option_id = pov.profile_option_id 
                                          AND po.profile_option_name IN ('FND_LANGUAGE'))
     ON (pov.level_value = users.user_guid)
   WHERE UPPER(users.username) = UPPER(:xdo_user_name)) lang_code,
  name, 
  type
FROM ask_application_clouds]]></xdm:sql>

  <xdm:dataModel xmlns="http://xmlns.oracle.com/oxp/xmlp" version="2.0" xmlns:xdm="http://xmlns.oracle.com/oxp/xmlp" xmlns:xsd="http://wwww.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" defaultDataSourceRef="demo" objectAbsolutePath="/Custom/More4apps-Finance/Common/USERS.xdm">
    <xdm:dataProperties>
      <xdm:property name="include_parameters" value="true" />
      <xdm:property name="include_null_Element" value="false" />
      <xdm:property name="include_rowsettag" value="false" />
      <xdm:property name="exclude_tags_for_lob" value="false" />
      <xdm:property name="EXCLUDE_LINE_FEED_AND_CARRIAGE_RETURN_FOR_LOB" value="false" />
      <xdm:property name="xml_tag_case" value="upper" />
      <xdm:property name="generate_output_format" value="xml" />
      <xdm:property name="optimize_query_executions" value="false" />
      <xdm:property name="enable_xml_chunks" value="" />
      <xdm:property name="sql_monitor_report_generated" value="false" />
    </xdm:dataProperties>
    <xdm:dataSets>
      <xdm:dataSet name="USERS" type="complex">
        <xdm:sql dataSourceRef="ApplicationDB_FSCM"><![CDATA[SELECT
u.username,
u.user_ID,
d.first_name, 
d.last_name surname,
d.EMAIL_ADDRESS email
FROM per_users u JOIN hrt_persons_d d USING (person_id)
WHERE 
u.active_flag='Y' 
AND SYSDATE between d.effective_start_date and d.effective_end_date
AND u.username  like :SEARCH
AND ROWNUM < 10000
ORDER BY d.first_name,d.last_name]]></xdm:sql>
      </xdm:dataSet>
      <xdm:dataSet name="actions" type="complex">
        <xdm:sql dataSourceRef="ApplicationDB_FSCM"><![CDATA[SELECT meaning, 
lookup_code, 
lookup_Type 
from fnd_lookup_values_vl 
WHERE lookup_type= 'CMP_SAL_XLS_LOADER_MODE' 
and Lookup_code <> 'DELETE'
AND (MEANING IN (:ACTION) OR MEANING LIKE :ACTION_SEARCH)
AND ROWNUM <10000]]></xdm:sql>
      </xdm:dataSet>
    </xdm:dataSets>
    <xdm:output rootName="DATA_DS" uniqueRowName="false">
      <xdm:nodeList name="data-structure">
        <xdm:dataStructure tagName="DATA_DS">
          <xdm:group name="G_1" label="G_1" source="USERS">

            <xdm:element name="FIRST_NAME" value="FIRST_NAME" label="FIRST_NAME" dataType="xsd:string" breakOrder="" fieldOrder="3" />
            <xdm:element name="USER_ID" value="USER_ID" label="USER_ID" dataType="xsd:double" breakOrder="" fieldOrder="2" />
            <xdm:element name="SURNAME" value="SURNAME" label="SURNAME" dataType="xsd:string" breakOrder="" fieldOrder="4" />
            <xdm:element name="EMAIL" value="EMAIL" label="EMAIL" dataType="xsd:string" breakOrder="" fieldOrder="5" />
          </xdm:group>
          <xdm:group name="G_2" label="G_2" source="actions">
            <xdm:element name="MEANING" value="MEANING" label="MEANING" dataType="xsd:string" breakOrder="" fieldOrder="1" />
            <xdm:element name="LOOKUP_CODE" value="LOOKUP_CODE" label="LOOKUP_CODE" dataType="xsd:string" breakOrder="" fieldOrder="2" />
            <xdm:element name="LOOKUP_TYPE" value="LOOKUP_TYPE" label="LOOKUP_TYPE" dataType="xsd:string" breakOrder="" fieldOrder="3" />
          </xdm:group>
        </xdm:dataStructure>
      </xdm:nodeList>
    </xdm:output>

    <xdm:lexicals />
    <xdm:parameters>
      <xdm:parameter name="ACTION_SEARCH" dataType="xsd:string" rowPlacement="1">
